name: AC Cola
description: Tastes just like the real thing.

name: Alpha Blade
description: Like the stars in the sky. Caution: Also as hot as them.

name: Apple
description: An apple a day keeps the doctor away!

name: Arrow
description: Can be attached to the crossbow.

description: An arrow that illuminates the surrounding area.

description: Teleport more accurately with the precision of an arrow.

name: Chaos Axe
description: Even gods falter before you.

name: Backpack

description: Go bananas! Turn this in for Nuts.

description: A tasty snack. Contains 1% banana juice.

description: Carry this device around for vibes on the go!

description: A dangerous-looking vegetable...bomb.

description: Clank them around as if you are a knight riding a horse.

description: Optimized for survival. Contents undisclosed.
